 */import{AsyncResult}from'@msdyn365-commerce/retail-proxy';import{wrapDataAction}from'./wrap-data-action';/**
 * Higher order function which exposes the current method as an action
 * @param action The action method
 * @param isBatched If the service call can handle batched requests efficiently
 * @param input Optional parameter of a single instance or an array of IActionInputs that will be passed to the action method.
 */export var createObservableDataAction=function createObservableDataAction(options){var wrappedAction=wrapDataAction(options,function(arg1,arg2){return new AsyncResult(function(resolve,reject){arg2.chainAction(options.action,arg1).then(function(result){resolve(result);})["catch"](function(error){reject(error);});});});wrappedAction.prototype.setProperty('isObservable',true);return wrappedAction;};
